zapaddon.name: Attack Surface Detector
zapaddon.description: The Attack Surface Detector analyzes web application source code to generate endpoints that can be used for penetration testing.
zapaddon.author: Secure Decisions (Matthew DeLetto)
zapaddon.changes:
Various incremental changes (see https://github.com/secdec/attack-surface-detector-zap/releases)
Fix un-handled exception when target unavailable & address various "house keeping" tasks.
